title: I'd like to see an Aether Wisp + Forbidden Idol item
body:
Any ideas for a new item that would need both as a recipe?

I'm thinking Aether Wisp + Forbidden Idol + Blasting Wand + 340 gp

**Escape Velocity**

* 80 AP
* 15 mana/5
* 8% movement speed
* 10% CDR
* Passive: Whenever you take damage, you gain 40 movement speed that decays over 2 seconds.

replies.body: Part of the goal of creating those two items is so that they can be used as building blocks for future recipes. I am pretty confident we'll see additional items build out of them in the future. I'm not sure they both need to be fused into the same item (such as the one you're suggestion) but there is certainly a lot of room still to expand and grow the item system. You'll see us continuing to make adjustments in the future.

Could you guys do more stuff with {{item:3191}} ? I friggin' LOVE this item and think it's awesome both on it's own and as a building block. Asides, seems like a waste that an item this interesting only has one singular build path.

{{item:3010}} {{item:3191}} {{item:3044}} {{item:3155}} {{item:3136}} : We all want love, too! ;)

Looking forward to what's going to be in store, and hope there can be good (and civilized) discussion about it.

Okay, cool FeralPony.

Maybe you guys can combine Aether Wise and a Zeal for a new hybrid mobility item as well.
Great, now give Phage 2 more build paths so its on par with Sheen and Zeal{{item:3044}}

I'm glad you all over at Riot are acknowledging the need to expand and grow the item system. This one of the only vices I have about League, the limited item choice. It tickles me every time you all release a new item. Can't wait to see what else you guys have in store!
Very excited to see what's in store! (hehe, hehe.....ok I'll leave...)

I'm not sure if an item like this would be appropriate for an AP item. I think it would be more appropriate as a tank item, although even as a tank item I'm not sure if it would be healthy.

I do like the name of the item though.
